name: Medieval Lords: Build, Defend, Expand
description:
In the Middle Ages, kingdoms rise and fall as borders are redefined in a day. To succeed as city governor will take sharp city building skills, a craving for new resources in neighbouring lands, and strong defences against aggressors. Construct cities in full 3D, walk the streets and mingle with your subjects, build city defences, and evolve technologies. It's city building, beyond boundaries!

Features
BUILD! Construct bustling towns from the ground up - manage basic needs, maintain a strong economy, acquire new technologies, and keep your population happy and healthy.

EXPAND! Develop your kingdom onto neighbouring lands, discover new resources, strengthen defences, and advance your empire.

PLAY YOUR WAY! Advance your kingdom through light story-driven scenarios. Build your own maps with the landscape editor and share your creations with other players online.

DESIGN WITHOUT LIMITS! Construct buildings anywhere and lay roads wherever you want. Over 100 buildings are available, along with upgrades and free-shape structures that fit in tight spaces. Evolve cities using 6 technology categories.

CHOOSE YOUR VIEW! Experience the first city builder game in full 3D! Manage cities from above and then zoom in to walk the fields and wander the streets.

BUILD IN FULL 3D! Experience a new level of realism. Hills are natural defences against invaders, but slow down the city's expansion; rivers provide water and make agriculture easier; ...
